Verses: 1 boomiyin Kudigale, Ellaarum Karththarai Gembeeramaaip Paadungal.
2 magizhchchiyode Karththarukku Aaraadhanaiseydhu, Aanandhasaththaththode Avar Sannidhimun Vaarungal.
3 karththare Dhevanendru Ariyungal; Naam Alla, Avare Nammai Undaakkinaar; Naam Avar Janangalum, Avar Meychchalin Aadugalumaayirukkirom.
4 avar Vaasalgalil Thudhiyodum, Avar Piraagaarangalil Pugazhchchiyodum Piravesiththu, Avaraith Thudhiththu, Avarudaiya Naamaththai Sthoththiriyungal.
5 karththar Nallavar, Avarudaiya Kirubai Endrendraikkum, Avarudaiya Unmai Thalaimurai Thalaimuraikkum Ulladhu.
